colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042B (BSLAB PA YONGS SU SBYONG BA'I GZHI GSUM GYI CHO GA LA SOGS PA, SO SOR THAR PA'I BLANG DOR GYI GNAS RNAMS MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI, MKHYEN RAB GYI DBANG PHYUG SNYING DUS KYI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA MNGON MTHO DANG NGES LEGS KYI LAM GYI GNAD MTHA' DAG PAR THUGS SU CHUD NAS, SKAL BA DANG LDAN PA RNAMS LA TSUL BZHIN DU 'DOMS PA CHOS KYI RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYI PHYAG LEN LTAR, 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS, ,BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS TE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,AOm SVA STI, ,RLABS CHEN TSOGS GNYIS BSKAL BAR RAB GOMS PAS, ,NYES TSOGS BDUD BZHI'I GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHING, ,@043A *, ,MA LUS 'GRO BA'I PHAN BDE RGYAS MDZAD PA'I, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS DENG 'DIR DGE LEGS STZOL, ,MNGON PAR MTHO DANG SKU GSUM NGES LEGS BCAS, ,BDE BLAG NYID DU BSGRUB PA'I THABS KYI MCHOG ,BSLAB PA YONGS SBYONG GZHI GSUM RNAM GZHAG 'DI, ,SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM RNAM DKAR NYI 'OD KYIS, ,BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA SO SOR THAR PA YI, , NYAMS LEN PADMO'I TSAL RAB RGYAS GYUR NAS, ,'CHAL TSUL GDUNG BA'I MUN SDUG ZHI GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
